snippet.title: APICO | Coming to Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Harvest resources, build your apiary, and cross-breed to discover the many different species of bees in APICO, launching on the Nintendo Switch on July 7th! 🐝

APICO is a laid-back beekeeping sim game about breeding, collecting, & conserving bees! Set in a series of lush environments, APICO uniquely combines resource gathering, biology, and beekeeping minigames, taking ideas from a mix of real-life and fantasy apiculture & floriculture.

Plus, did you know that a portion of APICO’s proceeds will go directly to beekeeping and conservation charities? 

That means you can help to #savethebees (irl) by saving the bees (digital)!

For more information on the charities we’re donating to, head over to the link below: https://apico.buzz/savethebees/
